author: rickhall
msg: If we are unable to reload a cached bundle, then we should delete the
entire cached bundle directory, not just the revision. (FELIX-2222)

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-701. java:  Generated classes take up more space in jar than needed
Use a static {} block instead of an anonymous inner class to define metaDataMap. This saves some space in jars generated by avoiding the internal class.
